articles.title: NSO Group used another WhatsApp zero-day after being sued, court docs say - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Israeli surveillance firm NSO Group reportedly used multiple zero-day exploits, including an unknown one named "Erised," that leveraged WhatsApp vulnerabilities to deploy Pegasus spyware in zero-click attacks, even after getting sued.
